profile.avatar_description: JPG no bigger than 800px wide and tall.

error.firstname_min_limit: Firstname must be longer than 2 letters
error.lastname_min_limit: Lastname must be longer than 2 letters
error.firstname_max_limit: Lastname must be shorter than 50 letters
error.lastname_max_limit: Lastname must be shorter than 50 letters
error.password_min_limit: Password must contains more than 6 characters
error.username_min_limit: Username must be longer than 5 letters
error.username_max_limit: Username must be shorter than 20 letters
error.must_have_letter_number: Password must contains at least one letter and one number
error.phone_min_limit: Phone number must be more than 10 digits.
error.zipcode_only_number: ZIP Code must only contain numbers.
error.avatar_size_too_large: The size of the image is large and must be less than 120 KB.
error.avatar_must_bg_jpg: The image format must be jpg.
error.avatar_dimension_too_large: The height and width of the photo must be smaller than 800 pixels.
